title: Phoenix Lands in the World
overview: Meng Xiao Tang is an internet-famous author who meets a sentimental reader that asks her to find her original intention of writing martial arts novels. She decides to amend a blood-thirsty novel, ""The Story of Nan Xi"", following a villainous heroine who cuts off her love for the sake of reaching the top. After randomly changing the plot for money which angered the online literary system, she was accidentally sent into the martial arts world she changed...
